<title level="2" right="Creature 17">[Rezatha](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2334)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 392</row>

**Perception** +28; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)darkvision, [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) (imprecise) 60 feet

**Languages**
[Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8); (can't speak any languages)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +34, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +29

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +9

**Dex** +6

**Con** +9

**Int** -3

**Wis** +6

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 39 

**Fort** +32 

**Ref** +27 

**Will** +29 

</row>

**HP** 330

**Immunities**
cold, fire

**Heat** ([aura](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=5), [evocation](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1671), [fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=13), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) 5 feet. A creature that starts its turn in the aura takes 4d6 fire damage. Whenever Rezatha takes damage from an enemy, this damage increases to 6d6 until the start of its next turn. Any creature that hits Rezatha with an unarmed strike takes 6d6 fire damage, and a weapon that hits Rezatha takes 6d6 fire damage.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +34 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d12+17 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +34 ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d6+17 bludgeoning plus 3d6 fire

**Breath Weapon** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) Rezatha unleashes a gout of flame that deals 18d6 fire damage in a 30-foot cone (DC 38 basic Reflex save). It can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** <actions string="Single Action" />  Large, 2d10+8 bludgeoning damage plus 3d6 fire, Rupture 30

**Thrash** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Rezatha Strikes once with its jaws and once with its tail, each targeting a different creature. Each attack counts toward its multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after all the attacks have been made.

</column>
